about_the_game:
Functionality that allows you to edit the data for forces, cities, and areas within the game "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Note: If you perform edits, you will no longer be able to attain Trophies.

▼Editable Content
Forces
- Rank
- Kingdom
- Doctrine Lv
- Foreign Relationships
- Alliance Period

Cities
- Scale
- Gold
- Supplies
- Troops
- Durability
- Morale
- The tactics that can be set to cities

Areas
- Commerce development levels
- Agriculture development levels
- Barracks development levels
- Population
- Public Order

▼How to Use
Forces, cities, and areas can be edited by selecting "Settings" - "Edit" within the game.

name: RTK14: Editor - 3rd Wave

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 Display required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 (3.0GHz or over)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit 5.1ch Surround, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: 1920 x 1080 Display recommended

short_description: Functionality that allows you to edit the data for forces, cities, and areas within the game "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV".
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
